BodyName: Subcommittee on Planning, Dispositions and Concessions

Items.Title: Uniform land use review procedure application no. C 090071 HAM, an Urban Development Action Area Designation and Project, located at 567 West 183rd Street, and the disposition of such property, Borough Manhattan, Council District no. 10.  This matter is subject to Council Review and action pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the New York City Charter and Article 16 of the General Municipal Law.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Application no. C 090078 HUK submitted by the Department of Housing Preservation and Development (HPD) pursuant to Section 505 of Article 15 of the General Municipal (Urban Renewal) Law of New York State and Section 197-c of the New York City Charter for the third amendment to the Fresh Creek Urban Renewal Plan, Borough of Brooklyn, Community District 5.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: ULURP, Fresh Creek Urban Renewal Plan, Brooklyn (C090078HUK)

Items.Title: Application no. C 090079 ZMK submitted by the Department of Housing Preservation and Development. pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section No. 17d.

Items.Title: Application no. C 090081 ZSK submitted by the Department of Housing Preservation and Development  pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for the grant of a special permit pursuant to Section 74-744 (c) of the Zoning Resolution to modify the regulations of  Section 32-64, Section 32-65 and Section 33-66. This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d (b)(2) of the Charter or called up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d (b)(3) of the Charter.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee

This matter is subject to council Review and action pursuant to § 197-d of the New York city Charter and Article 16 of the General Municipal Law.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
